casebody.data:
SCHUMACHER HOMES OF CIRCLEVILLE, INC., petitioner,
v.
John SPENCER, et ux. No. 15-316. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 29, 2016.

Motion of Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. On petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia for further consideration in light of DIRECTV, Inc. v. Imburgia, 577 U.S. ----, 136 S.Ct. 463, 193 L.Ed.2d 365 (2015).
